Summary: (ROUGH) English translation of prior DE report of 4/29/09 event
trends: There has been one other sighting in Salzhausen
There was one other sighting in Salzhausen on or around April 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsSalzhausen, DE Begegnung (Encounter) A friend and I wanted to visit his sister in the hospital. It was about 30 minutes before the start of work. My friend saw something in the sky and told me that I should watch it. I saw it, we were not crazy. It was similar to a rocket, but had four points of flames which looked like they were at the head, right and left and bottom. It was very scary. I doubt I can say anything to someone without being labeled a crazy.
